nodes.text: The Heavy-Duty Modular Torso was a model of droid torso manufactured by Cybot Galactica at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

It was a squat five sided shape with mounting points on two sides for arms to be attached. A head could be placed on top of a flat mounting point and beneath could be connected to a wide variety of both legs or wheeled forms of locomotion.
The Cybot Galactica Heavy-Duty Modular torso was one of the basic droid parts that appeared in the 1998 video game Star Wars: DroidWorks.
